publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-1004 Bashir Ahmad: Congratulating Azeem Ibrahim - Britain’s Top 100 Most Influential Asians—That the Parliament congratulates Glasgow-born Azeem Ibrahim for being the youngest member of the Bank of Scotland’s top 100 most influential British Asians; believes that Azeem’s success encapsulates Scotland’s entrepreneurial spirit, proving that Scotland is more than capable of producing fresh young talent, and further believes that such prominent members of our community can act as role models for all of Scotland’s youth. Motions and amendments which have attracted additional support

S3M-1004 Congratulating Azeem Ibrahim - Britain’s Top 100 Most Influential Asians (lodged on 10 December 2007) Stuart McMillan*, Jamie Hepburn*, Michael Matheson*, Kenneth Gibson*, Rob Gibson*, Nanette Milne*, Shirley-Anne Somerville*, Bob Doris*, Christina McKelvie*, Alex Neil*, Robin Harper*, Joe FitzPatrick*, Andrew Welsh*
S3M-1004 Congratulating Azeem Ibrahim - Britain’s Top 100 Most Influential Asians (lodged on 10 December 2007) Bill Kidd*, Hugh Henry*
S3M-1004 Congratulating Azeem Ibrahim - Britain’s Top 100 Most Influential Asians (lodged on 10 December 2007) Gil Paterson*, Willie Coffey*

S3M-1004 Bashir Ahmad: Congratulating Azeem Ibrahim - Britain’s Top 100 Most Influential Asians—That the Parliament congratulates Glasgow-born Azeem Ibrahim for being the youngest member of the Bank of Scotland’s top 100 most influential British Asians; believes that Azeem’s success encapsulates Scotland’s entrepreneurial spirit, proving that Scotland is more than capable of producing fresh young talent, and further believes that such prominent members of our community can act as role models for all of Scotland’s youth. Supported by: Stuart McMillan, Jamie Hepburn, Michael Matheson, Kenneth Gibson, Rob Gibson, Nanette Milne, Shirley-Anne Somerville, Bob Doris, Christina McKelvie, Alex Neil, Robin Harper, Joe FitzPatrick, Andrew Welsh, Bill Kidd, Hugh Henry, Gil Paterson, Willie Coffey
S3M-1004 Congratulating Azeem Ibrahim - Britain’s Top 100 Most Influential Asians (lodged on 10 December 2007) Dave Thompson*
